room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cleveland
review: This was such a fun girls night. The actors were amazing and it was a fun interaction. That chain getting a little longer on our zombie was kind of scary though. Lol.

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cleveland
review: We had a blast! The experience from beginning to end was fun, exciting and challenging! Go! You will not regret it!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cleveland
review: Just got done with this. Actors are funny. Storyline is funny. My kids screamed the entire time. Worth a visit for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cleveland
review: This was our first experience with escape room adventures and it was so awesome! What a great time with great people! Definitely recommend to friends and family! Keep rockin!

room_title: Escape room "Trapped in a Room with a Zombie" by Great Room Escape in Cleveland
review: Our experience was great. We had a fun team and a lot of laughing. It was the best thing we could have done tonight. The clues were challenging and kept us thinking. We got out with ten minutes left! How exciting. We will be back to visit our zombie Alex because for his first night he did a great job!
